text:
0210,	and	also	offers	
a helpline for speakers of 
Bengali/Sylheti on 0300 456 
2421. Lines are open from 
9.30am to 9.30pm.
Breastfeeding information 
and support contacts are 
available from the Public 
Health Agency website
www.breastfedbabies.org
The booklet Off to a Good 
Start should have been given 
to you in hospital soon after or 
before you gave birth. You can 
also view this at pha.site/good-
start
The following voluntary 
organisations can also provide 
information and advice:
La Le
